content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'default_honghaigen2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [default_honghaigen2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://default@honghaigen2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO
--drop EXTERNAL TABLE fhv
 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE fhv (
	[dispatchBaseNum] nvarchar(4000),
	[pickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[dropOffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[srFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[puYear] int,
	[puMonth] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Guest/fhv/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [default_honghaigen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.fhv
GO
